tool_description: Creates comprehensive visualizations of safety patterns and trends from analyzed incident data to support presentation and decision-making.

output_format.description: Output format: png, pdf, svg, or interactive

color_scheme.description: Color scheme: safety, corporate, accessible, or custom

include_annotations.description: Whether to include explanatory annotations on charts

error_messages: Missing analysis results: At least one analysis result must be provided.
Invalid chart type: Use supported chart types like bar, line, heatmap, scatter, pie.
Unsupported output format: Use png, pdf, svg, or interactive.
Invalid color scheme: Use safety, corporate, accessible, or custom.
Insufficient data: Not enough data to create meaningful visualizations.
Incompatible data format: Analysis results format not compatible with requested chart types.
usage: Provide analysis_results array and chart_types to visualize. Choose output_format for intended use. Select appropriate color_scheme for audience. Enable include_annotations for explanatory charts.

generated_charts.description: List of generated chart file names or identifiers

chart_summaries.description: Brief descriptions of what each chart shows

recommendations.description: Recommendations for improving visualizations or adding additional charts
